text: Lucerapex is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Turridae, the turrids. ==Species== Species within the genus Lucerapex include: * Lucerapex adenica Powell, 1964 * Lucerapex angustatus (Powell, 1940) * Lucerapex carola (Thiele, 1925) * Lucerapex casearia (Hedley & Petterd, 1906) * Lucerapex denticulata (Thiele, 1925) * Lucerapex indagatoris (Finlay H.J., 1927) * Lucerapex schepmani Shuto, 1970 ==References== ==External links== * Abdelkrim J., Aznar-Cormano L., Fedosov A., Kantor Y., Lozouet P., Phuong M., Zaharias P. & Puillandre N. (2018). Exon-capture based phylogeny and diversification of the venomous gastropods (Neogastropoda, Conoidea). Molecular Biology and Evolution. 35(10): 2355-2374 Category:Turridae
title: Lucerapex
